pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computerized Adaptive Multistage Testing // Assemble the panels of computerized adaptive multistage testing by the bottom-up and the top-down approach, and simulate the administration of the assembled panels. The full documentation and tutorials are at https://github.com/xluo11/Rmst. Reference: Luo and Kim (2018) doi:10.1111/jedm.12174.
